meanings.definition: Relating to or located in the fovea.
meanings.sent1: The foveal region of the eye is responsible for sharp vision.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the foveal area to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The foveal spot seemed to sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her foveal gaze captured every detail of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The foveal colors of the sunset were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the central area of the retina.
meanings.sent1: The foveal part of the retina is crucial for clear vision.
meanings.sent2: The specialist studied the foveal region for signs of damage.
meanings.sent3: The foveal center of the eye was like a tiny bullseye.
meanings.sent4: Her foveal vision zeroed in on the smallest details.
meanings.sent5: The foveal pattern of the retina was intricate and delicate.

meanings.sent1: The foveal structure plays a key role in visual acuity.
meanings.sent2: The foveal cells are essential for processing light.
meanings.sent3: The foveal point was like a tiny jewel in the eye.
meanings.sent4: Her foveal focus was unwavering during the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The foveal detail in the image was astonishing.
